Where to check for deals on Apple Macs

Mac Prices is one of the fist places to go when looking for deals on Apple Macs and accessories.

MacPrices.net - Apple Mac, iPad, & iPod prices & reviews. Updated Daily

Many price comparison websites use robots to gather pricing information from various vendors. This often leads to inaccurate or outdated prices, or prices for left-over, refurbished, and open-box machines. In addition, you rarely get information on free bundles, rebates, or discounts. As opposed to these sites, we use a real person to update our prices each morning. We visit the resellerâ€™s website to see the prices and bundles with our own eyes, and if that fails, we pick up the telephone and give them a call.
